name: Twilio Barista
description: A Node.js application that allows users to order coffee via channels like SMS using Twilio.

LOGINS.description: Semicolon-separated list of users in the schema username,password,role. Roles available are admin and barista

PHONE_NUMBER_HASHING_SECRET.description: Secret that is being used to generate the identities of the users based on their phone numbers

TWILIO_MESSAGING_SERVICE.description: Your Twilio Messaging Service SID. www.twilio.com/console/sms/services

TWILIO_SYNC_SERVICE.description: Your Twilio Sync Service SID. www.twilio.com/console/sync/services
